name: Scenario Differentiation
query: Compare copper demand forecasts between baseline and accelerated green transition scenarios through 2040. Show me how the scenarios differ in total demand and green copper (EV + renewables).
expected_behavior: Runs forecasts for both baseline and accelerated scenarios
Shows clear differentiation between scenarios with accelerated demand 20-30% higher than baseline
Identifies that accelerated scenario has 1.25x demand multiplier
Compares green copper (EV + Solar + Wind) between scenarios
Shows accelerated scenario has higher EV adoption rate (92% vs 75% by 2040)
Shows accelerated scenario has higher renewable capacity target (20 TW vs 15 TW)
Provides year-by-year comparison showing progressive divergence
